question.string: Which German cities have more than 250000 inhabitants?
Who was the successor of John F. Kennedy?
Who is the mayor of Berlin?
How many students does the Free University in Amsterdam have?
What is the second highest mountain on Earth?
Give me all professional skateboarders from Sweden.
When was Alberta admitted as province?
To which countries does the Himalayan mountain system extend?
Give me a list of all trumpet players that were bandleaders.
What is the total amount of men and women serving in the FDNY?
question.keywords: total amount, men, women, serve, FDNY

question.string: Who is the Formula 1 race driver with the most races?
Give me all world heritage sites designated within the past five years.
question.keywords: world heritage site, designate, past five years
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:WorldHeritageSite . ?uri dbp:year ?x . FILTER ( ?x >= "2007"^^xsd:integer) OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Who is the youngest player in the Premier League?
Give me all members of Prodigy.
What is the longest river?
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:River . ?uri dbp:length ?x . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY DESC(?x) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

question.string: Does the new Battlestar Galactica series have more episodes than the old one?
question.keywords: new BattleStar Galactica series, more, episodes, old Battle Star Galactica series
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Battlestar_Galactica_%281978_TV_series%29> dbo:numberOfEpisodes ?x . <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Battlestar_Galactica_%282004_TV_series%29> dbo:numberOfEpisodes ?y . FILTER (?y > ?x) }

question.string: Give me all cars that are produced in Germany.
Give me all people that were born in Vienna and died in Berlin.
How tall is Michael Jordan?
What is the capital of Canada?
Who is the governor of Texas?
question.query: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { res:Texas dbp:governor ?string . ?uri foaf:name ?string. }

question.string: Do Harry and William, Princes of Wales, have the same mother?
question.keywords: Harry, William, Prince of Wales, same, mother
question.query: PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> ASK WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Prince_William,_Duke_of_Cambridge> dbp:mother ?x . <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Prince_Harry_of_Wales> dbp:mother ?y . FILTER (?x = ?y) }

question.string: Who was the father of Queen Elizabeth II?
Which U.S. state has been admitted latest?
question.query: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string ?x WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:StatesOfTheUnitedStates . ?uri dbp:admittancedate ?x . OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY DESC(?x) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Show me all songs from Bruce Springsteen released between 1980 and 1990.
question.keywords: song, Bruce Springsteen, release, between 1980 and 1990
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Song . ?uri dbo:artist res:Bruce_Springsteen . ?uri dbo:releaseDate ?date . FILTER (?date >= '1980-01-01'^^xsd:date && ?date <= '1990-12-31'^^xsd:date) OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which movies did Sam Raimi direct after Army of Darkness?
question.keywords: Sam Reimi, direct, movie, after, Army of Darkness
question.query: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Film . ?uri dbo:director res:Sam_Raimi . { ?uri dbo:releaseDate ?x . } UNION { ?uri dbp:released ?x . } res:Army_of_Darkness dbo:releaseDate ?y . FILTER (?x > ?y) OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which country does the creator of Miffy come from?

OPTIONAL { ?uri rdfs:label ?string. FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } } ORDER BY ASC(?y) LIMIT 1
